revised_title: The Effects of Colchicum Autumnale on Gout and the Circulating Blood
tldr: The author investigates the effects of Colchicum Autumnale, a plant used to treat gout, and finds that it acts through the medium of the circulating blood. Experiments on both animals and the author himself demonstrate the rapid and effective relief of gout symptoms when the infusion is introduced into the bloodstream or taken orally.
